thread.title: Here is your first chilly look at Danielle Panabaker as Killer Frost in The Flash season 2 - The Flash Cult -
thread.title_full: Here is your first chilly look at Danielle Panabaker as Killer Frost in The Flash season 2 - The Flash News - Cult - Digital Spy

author: Ian Sandwell
title: Here is your first chilly look at Danielle Panabaker as Killer Frost in The Flash season 2 - The Flash Cult -
text: CBS has unveiled the first look at Killer Frost in The Flash season two.The photo premiered during Danielle Panabaker's appearance on CBS's The Talk on Friday (October 23) (via TVLine). © The CWDanielle Panabaker as Killer Frost "I'm such a girl, and I loved getting dressed up in that look," Panabaker said of her character's transformation into the villain."Our first suit was a one-piece, kind of like Catwoman, but it didn't feel quite right. So we changed it to be a top and these really cool leather pants. And the hair was awesome."It's great, I'm really excited." © The CWKiller Frost in The Flash season one finale 'Fast Enough' Viewers got their first glimpse of Killer Frost during The Flash's season one finale 'Fast Enough'.In the comics, Caitlin Snow becomes the villainous 'heat vampire' Killer Frost after a fateful encounter with agents of the HIVE organisation.Killer Frost won't be the only villain in town during season two as Arrow villain Damien Darhk is set to make an appearance.The Flash airs on Tuesdays on The CW in the US and on Sky One in the UK.
